channel.title: Sorry I've been quiet lately
channel.description: Sorry about the lack of posts lately. Had lots on at work and then lots on at home when I eventually get there so been too busy to play and find things of interest. Just for interest these are the...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by John+00:00
item.description: Try LUG Radio (http://www.lugradio.org/) - 4 English Linux geeks talking. Lots of nerdy laughter and strong opinions - but still interesting (normally one of the 4 takes a hard line of something and the other three will argue with him about it). The production values are reasonably high, you never know it might get you away from your beloved Windoze!!
item.dc:creator: John
